detailsSection: Read the success stories in this book to see how companies have created Office Business Applications (OBAs) to develop and strengthen customer relationships, create innovative products and services, improve operations, reduce costs, and build higher value connections with partners and suppliers.
systemRequirementsSection:
• To view the book in PDF format, you will need Adobe Acrobat Reader.

  • To view the book in XPS format, you will need an XPS Viewer.
installInstructionSection:
To install this download:
  1. Download the file by clicking the Download link (above).
  2. Click Run to start the extraction process.
  3. Follow the instructions on the screen to complete the extraction of files and save them to your hard disk.
To remove this download:

To remove the installed files, delete the following from your installation directory:

  • OBA_Momentum_Book.pdf
  • OBA_Momentum_Book.xps
